CustomField.description: Field to configure comma separated list of categories that each target system will be interested to receive. Each value in this field is looked up on the Subscription Categories metadata find the Subscription Picklist values.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field to configure comma separated list of categories that each target system will be interested to receive. Each value in this field is looked up on the Subscription Categories metadata find the Subscription Picklist values.
CustomField.label: Interested Categories
